languages.text: "Я встретил{mf||а} Джаспера в звездной гавани и спас{mf||ла} ему жизнь. Рассчитываю на благодарность. Назовите первенца в честь меня, или как там простонародье обычно благодарит героев?"
"I met Jaspar at the starport and saved his life. I expect some show of gratitude. You may name your firstborn after me or whatever it is that commoners do to thank their heroes."
languages.original_text: "Я встретил{mf||а} Джаспера в звездной гавани и спас{mf||ла} ему жизнь. Рассчитываю на благодарность. Назовите первенца в честь меня, или как там простонародье обычно благодарит героев?"

traits.locale_text: "I met Jaspar at the starport and saved his life. I expect a show of gratitude. You may name your firstborn after me or whatever it is that commoners do to thank their heroes."
"I met Jaspar at the starport and saved his life. I expect a show of gratitude. You may name your firstborn after me or whatever it is that commoners do to thank their heroes."
"I met Jaspar at the starport and saved his life. I expect some show of gratitude. You may name your firstborn after me or whatever it is that commoners do to thank their heroes."
"I met Jaspar at the starport and saved his life. I expect some show of gratitude. You may name your firstborn after me or whatever it is that commoners do to thank their heroes."
"I met Jaspar at the starport and saved his life. I expect some show of gratitude. You may name your firstborn after me or whatever it is that commoners do to thank their heroes."
"I met Jaspar at the starport and saved his life. I expect some show of gratitude. You may name your firstborn after me or whatever it is that commoners do to thank their heroes."

languages.text: «Conocí a Jaspar en el puerto estelar y le salvé la vida. Espero algún gesto de gratitud por su parte. Puede nombrar a su primogénito en mi honor, o lo que sea que hagan los plebeyos para agradecer a sus héroes».
languages.original_text: "I met Jaspar at the starport and saved his life. I expect some show of gratitude. You may name your firstborn after me or whatever it is that commoners do to thank their heroes."

traits.locale_text: «Conocí a Jaspar en el puerto estelar y le salvé la vida. Espero algún gesto de gratitud por su parte. Puede nombrar a su primogénito en mi honor, o lo que sea que hagan los plebeyos para agradecer a sus héroes».

languages.text: "Ich bin Jaspar am Raumhafen begegnet und habe ihm das Leben gerettet. Ich erwarte eine Geste der Dankbarkeit. Ihr könnt Euren Erstgeborenen nach mir benennen, oder was auch immer der Pöbel tut, um seinen Helden zu danken."
languages.original_text: "I met Jaspar at the starport and saved his life. I expect some show of gratitude. You may name your firstborn after me or whatever it is that commoners do to thank their heroes."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin Jaspar am Raumhafen begegnet und habe ihm das Leben gerettet. Ich erwarte eine Geste der Dankbarkeit. Ihr könnt Euren Erstgeborenen nach mir benennen, oder was auch immer der Pöbel tut, um seinen Helden zu danken."

languages.text: « J'ai croisé ce Jaspar à l'astroport et je lui ai sauvé la vie, j'attendrai donc de votre part un signe de gratitude. Vous pouvez donner mon nom à votre premier-né, par exemple ; je ne sais pas comment les gens du peuple remercient leurs héros. »
languages.original_text: "I met Jaspar at the starport and saved his life. I expect some show of gratitude. You may name your firstborn after me or whatever it is that commoners do to thank their heroes."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai croisé ce Jaspar à l'astroport et je lui ai sauvé la vie, j'attendrai donc de votre part un signe de gratitude. Vous pouvez donner mon nom à votre premier-né, par exemple ; je ne sais pas comment les gens du peuple remercient leurs héros. »

languages.text: “我在星港那边遇到了贾斯帕，救了他一命。我希望你能对我表示谢意，比如以我的名字为你的长子命名，或是做些其他普通人感激英雄的举动。”
languages.original_text: "I met Jaspar at the starport and saved his life. I expect some show of gratitude. You may name your firstborn after me or whatever it is that commoners do to thank their heroes."

traits.locale_text: “我在星港那边遇到了贾斯帕，救了他一命。我希望你能对我表示谢意，比如以我的名字为你的长子命名，或是做些其他普通人感激英雄的举动。”

languages.text: 「ジャスパーにはスターポートで出会って、その命を助けた。何らかの感謝の意を表してくれ。第一子に私の名前を付けるとか、一般市民が英雄に感謝する方法なら何でもいい」
languages.original_text: "I met Jaspar at the starport and saved his life. I expect some show of gratitude. You may name your firstborn after me or whatever it is that commoners do to thank their heroes."

traits.locale_text: 「スターポートでジャスパーに会って命を助けた。何らかの形で感謝してもらえるといいのだが。第一子に{mf|俺|私}の名前を付けるとか、平民が英雄に感謝する方法なら何でもいい」
「ジャスパーにはスターポートで出会って、その命を助けた。何らかの感謝の意を表してくれ。第一子に私の名前を付けるとか、一般市民が英雄に感謝する方法なら何でもいい」

languages.text: "Jaspar'la yıldız limanında tanıştım ve hayatını kurtardım. Biraz şükran beklerim doğrusu. Artık siz sıradan insanlar, kahramanlara minnetinizi ilk çocuğunuza adını vererek mi yoksa başka şekilde mi gösterirsiniz bilemem."
languages.original_text: "I met Jaspar at the starport and saved his life. I expect some show of gratitude. You may name your firstborn after me or whatever it is that commoners do to thank their heroes."

traits.locale_text: "Jaspar'la yıldız limanında tanıştım ve hayatını kurtardım. Biraz şükran beklerim doğrusu. Artık siz avamlar, kahramanlara minnetinizi ilk çocuğunuza adını vererek mi, yoksa başka şekilde mi gösterirsiniz bilemem."
